attributes.action: Save Nelson Mandela house from demolition
attributes.additional_details: was in todays sun newspaper the 4/1/19
attributes.background: Harlech tower best known as Nelson Mandela house in only fools and horses is to be demolished for posh flats this is a British icon and should be saved

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local planning issues are the responsibility of the local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
